titleStmt.title: Articles of visitation and enquiry. Concerning matters ecclesiastical exhibited to the ministers, church-wardens, and side-men of every parish within the Dioces of Durham. In the primary visitation of the Right Reverend Father in God Nathanael by divine providence Lord Bishop of Durham.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Durham.
Crewe, Nathaniel, 1633-1721.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped at foot with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
